nodes.text: The Scorp Club was a members-only club located on the Bazaar Deck of the luxury liner Kuari Princess. Membership was complimentary to passengers staying in the liner's suites, and membership could be bought for twenty-five credits for passengers traveling in the deluxe staterooms. Other passengers could become members for one hundred and twenty-five credits. Membership of the club was only valid for the duration of the cruise.
